Job Description for SRE

As we expand our service offerings, we are currently seeking an experienced solutions architect to analyze and improve existing complex architecture. Specifically, we are searching for someone who brings fresh ideas, demonstrates a unique and informed viewpoint, and enjoys collaborating with a cross-functional team to develop real-world solutions and positive user experiences at every interaction.

Objectives of this Role

 

\u25cf    Measure and optimize system performance, with an eye toward pushing our capabilities forward, getting ahead of customer needs, and innovating to continually improve our processes.

\u25cf    Communicate to the executive team on the architectural approach that has been taken in our GCP landscape.

\u25cf    Present architecture via presentations and clear diagrams depictions. 

\u25cf    Breakdown the architecture into tangible tasks for a developer to execute in an Agile format.

\u25cf    Run the production environment by monitoring availability and taking a holistic view of system health.

\u25cf    Improve observability, reliability, and quality of our suite of software solutions.

\u25cf    Provide primary operational support and engineering for our rapidly growing new business units.

 

 

Daily and Monthly Responsibilities

\u25cf    Gather and analyze metrics from both operating systems and applications to assist in performance tuning and fault finding

\u25cf    Participate in system design consulting, platform management, and capacity planning

\u25cf    Balance feature development speed and reliability with well-defined service level objectives

Required Skills and Qualifications

\u25cf    Ability to program (structured and OO) with one or more high level languages, such as Golang, Python, or Java

\u25cf    Experience with Hyper Ledger blockchain technology

\u25cf    Strong understanding of Kubernetes, GKE a plus

\u25cf    Strong familiarity with Google Cloud Platform and related Google service offerings

\u25cf    GitHub, GitLab, Confluence and Jira experience a must.

\u25cf    Experience with Prometheus and Grafana.

\u25cf    A proactive approach to spotting problems, areas for improvement, and performance bottlenecks

\u25cf    A desire to take ownership of a new and growing production environment.
